src:
Stor festival i Trondheim tar ett års pause
01 Nov 2019, 20:21 by Kjerstin Rabås,Elise Rønningen
Trondheim Rocks har valgt å ta ett års pause, informerer de på sine Facebook-sider. - Vi ønsker ikke å lage et B-produkt, sier Stein Vanebo.
- Vi må dessverre informere om at Trondheim Rocks vil ta et års pause i 2020, skriver festivalen på sine Facebook-sider.
text:
Big festival in Trondheim takes one year break
01 Nov 2019, 20:21 by Kjerstin Rabås, Elise Rønningen
Trondheim Rocks has chosen to take a one-year break, they inform on their Facebook pages. - We don't want to make a B-product, says Stein Vanebo.
- Unfortunately, we must inform that Trondheim Rocks will take a one-year break in 2020, the festival writes on its Facebook pages.
